params.query: query ($first: Int, $offset: Int) { me {id messageThreads(sortBy: "updatedAt", order: "desc", first: $first, offset: $offset) {total hasMore items { id unreadCount lastReadAt createdAt updatedAt participants { id name avatarUrl } messages(first: 1, order: "desc") {items { id createdAt text creator { id name}}}}}}}
